runs.comm: bowls the slower one full and swinging away and Peterson squeezes it just wide of mid-off
swings it in late and Gibbs taps it softly to Clarke at point
keeps it full and when Gibbs drives to mid-off Peterson ambles out of his crease and scampers back
bowls it full on the offstump and he pushes it inside out to cover
lands it wide down the legside and Gibbs doesn't want to chase it
lunges onto the stroke a little too early and the ball rolls off his body, Gibbs tells his partner to stay back
tip and run, well played and well run by Gibbs after tapping it softly wide of short cover
poor start for Harwood and Gibbs obliges a half volley by getting forward and timing it sweetly past the covers, no need to chase that
he overpitches on the pads this time and Gibbs works it wide of midwicket with little effort, Warner does the chasing

there's a direct hit but it's overthrows! Gibbs defends inside out to cover and sets off for a risky single, the ball hits the stumps at the striker's end and deflects to the third man fence and there's an appeal for the run out, he's safe
almost a wicket! He swings his bat at a short ball and the ball balloons off the leading edge and falls short of backward point who dives forward in vain
swings at another short ball and takes his hand off the bat and the ball falls well in front of mid-on this time
fullish on the pads and worked to the on side
tries to loft through the line over mid-off but he miscues it and the ball lands short of the fielder who runs backwards, not the best-timed shot
bowls it shorter and he fails to make proper contact with the bat
that's outta here! He gives him the charge as Bracken drops it on a good length and clubs it over deep square leg and over the chalets
timber! And Bracken has his revenge! He cleverly bowls the slower ball and Gibbs fails to read it as he swings early and misses, the ball clips the top of the off stump and he's got to go
gets a full delivery yo start off with and he drives off the meat of the bat to cover
nice start for the debutant, swings it in and it's bang on middle stump, he defends
gives him a lot of width and Peterson has to reach out real far to scoop it down to third man
struggles with his line again as he dishes out another wide one and an attempted cut meets the toe of the bat
fuller and closer to the stumps and a firm drive finds mid-off
tries to break free by giving room but he only manages to chop it down to short cover
well Laughlin strays so wide of the offstump that de Villiers cannot reach it

doesn't take too long for Laughlin to strike, not really a wicket-taking ball, it was full and wide and waiting to be hit but de Villiers gets forward and ends up slamming it straight to White at short cover
taps it with soft hands and Peterson calls for the run very quickly
bangs in the bouncer and he's happy to duck and let it go
punches it softly to mid-off and risks the single and his life as the throw nearly takes his head off at the bowler's end, a desperate dive and he's home
tries to swing him across the line but he finds square leg
goes for a wild pull off a short ball down the leg side but he misses and there's a stifled appeal for a caught behind, funnily enough that wasn't called a wide so it must have brushed something
swings him towards midwicket and a misfield allows a single
pitches it up outside off and he lofts through the line and clears mid-off
drifts on the body and he clips him down to the on side
that's a nasty bouncer and he takes his eyes off the ball and the ball clips his arm and clears the keeper
full outside off and pushed just wide of mid-off
fullish on the pads and he pushes it to short midwicket
swings too early and fails to account for the swing as the ball clips his pads and rolls to the onside
Peterson moves a long way across his stumps to scoop it to fine leg but the execution was poor, fails to make any contact
makes room to crash it through the offside but he gets a thick inside edge wide of the stumps
can't quite decide what shot to play and he settles for a gentle dab towards the keeper
much better, tip and run to the off side and he gets off strike
that's more like it! He stays at the crease, waits for the short ball to come on to him before pulling fiercely over deep midwicket and deep square
hits a good length outside off and a firm punch finds mid-off
full outside of and pushed straight to mid-off
that's a full toss and he pushes it down to mid-on
absolutely nobody under that, he gets on his knee to a flighted delivery and slogs him dead straight over the ropes
full outside off and pushed wide of cover
fullish on the pads and worked down to mid-on
drifts on the pads and he clips it wide of square leg and takes a quick single
good improvisation there! He gets on his knee, picks up the full delivery on the pads and sweeps him to long leg
too wide outside off and he reaches out and the ball flies off the top edge of the bat and races to third man
brilliant save by White at wide mid-off! That saved a couple of runs surely
another excellent save, this time by Clarke at backward point! Two good shots for no runs
he clubs a short delivery but mistimes it and the ball just falls short of mid-on
much better, he gets to the pitch of the ball and slams a full delivery over wide mid-off and extra cover, the timing was good
full toss down the leg side and he clips him down to fine leg
fullish on the pad and he clips it softly to the on side for a single
makes room to a short ball and bashes it down to long-on
he waits for the ball to come onto him before softly dabbing it past the keeper
drops it a fraction too short and he makes a wee bit of room and chops it hard to the off side
he really fires this one quick and drops it a bit short, Peterson manages to push it back to the bowler
moves across for the paddle scoop but he finds short fine leg
bowls the slower one and he makes room but checks his drive, Hopes misfields on the follow through
Peterson gives himself way too much room and exposes the stumps too much for his liking, Hopes fires it on the blockhole and the ball cannons onto the stumps, the bails are splattered
just gets a bit of width and he chops it down to point
strays on the pads and he clips it on the up to fine leg
Hopes doesn't bowl to his field there, he sprays it on the pads and Duminy moves across and clips it well wide of short fine leg
turns it softly in front of deep square leg and thinks of a second run
full on the offstump and pushed down the ground to long-off
gets on his knee and slog sweeps him and the ball falls short of deep square
fires it outside off and he squeezes it to the off side
gets on his knee and tries to smash him straight but the ball travels off the slice of the bat and drops short of long-off
jams it on the blockhole and he makes a bit of room and squirts it to backward point
he drops it short and takes the pace of the ball, enough to fox the batsman who makes room and swings and misses
he gets forward and plays a firm cover drive but there's protection in the deep
Duminy fails to pick the slower ball and he fails to put away a legstump half volley
takes the pace off the ball and Duminy works it through the line to long-on
great stuff from Hopes as he fires it on the blockhole outside off and the batsman swings hard, the ball takes the under edge and lobs to the keeper
pushes it down the pitch but he fails to beat the bowler
floats it on leg and he works it down to square leg
chops it hard down the pitch back to the bowler
steps down the track and he gets enough power and wood behind the ball to clear long-off, it's a mishit in fact
floated towards leg and he places it wide of mid-off
places it down to short fine leg
fullish on the pads and he swings across the line and places it to the deep
makes a bit of room and swings a full delivery across the line and beats midwicket, a sliding stop saves a boundary, the Australians have fielded really well today
drops the length short and van der Merwe swings and misses it completely
once again swings way too early at a short delivery outside off, all his swings seem to meet thin air
bludgeons a full delivery to mid-off and a direct hit by Ponting would have sent van der Merwe packing
lucky strike for Harwood! He bowls a full toss on the stumps and Duminy moves across his stumps to paddle it away but misses and his leg stump is flattened
going going gone! He takes a couple of paces down and swings him straight over his head and the sightscreen
makes  room to club him down the ground and he swings and misses it completely
it's a full toss outside off and he makes room and scoops him high over cover, there must have been about 50 hands over the rope trying to catch that
that's a mishit and it still goes for four! He tries to pull him over the on side but the ball balloons over the off side and finds the boundary at deep backward point
take that! He makes a bit of room and sends a full toss crashing past extra cover, that travelled like a rocket
Dropped He swings wildly again and goes for broke and the ball is into orbit for ages, White loses sight of it at mid-off and drops it
full outside off and pushes it to the off side
makes room and he clubs a low full toss down to deep square leg
he's a lucky bloke as yet another mishit manages to clear the rope! Amazing! He tries to deposit him over deep midwicket but the ball sails over deep point instead, what bat speed
bowls the slower one and he swings wildly and misses, so does Haddin as a fumble allows a bye
that's well bowled, he fires it on the yorker length and he squeezes it down to the off side
full on the pads and punched hard down the ground to long-on

he goes for 48, Harwood drops it short and van der Merwe makes room to slice it through the off side, the short length foxes him and he has no room to work with and as a result he gets a faint edge to Haddin
drops it short and he swings and misses
chops it down back to the bowler and tells his partner to stay back
jams it on the blockhole and he squirts it down to backward point
comes round the wicket and sprays it spectacularly wide outside off, the ball nearly lands outside the pitch area
fullish on the stumps and clubbed away to long-on
lands it on a good length and cramps him for room as he tucks it down to square leg
low full toss outside off and he only manages a single to long-on
wild swing and a miss, he was beaten for pace and the ball sails just over the top of the stumps
takes the pace off the ball and another swing and a miss, the ball just creeps past the offstump this time
bangs it in short and he swings and boy does he make contact! He just manages to clear Ponting's palm at deep square leg
bangs it in short and Boucher takes his eyes off the ball as he shapes to pull and the ball rolls off the body, Laughlin attempts an athletic under arm flick
hurries onto him as he shapes to pull and the ball rolls off the splice of the bat to the on side
gives him the charge and he cleverly bowls the slower ball wide of the offstump
he slogs and misses it completely
he bowls it on the stumps and gets punished, he makes room and slogs him away, it's more of a flat six which just clears the deep midwicket rope
